name: L'Atelier Perdu
description:
L'Atelier Perdu is a small escape room game created for Global Game Jam 2020.

Just use the mouse as controls and Esc to quit the game.

There's two ways to win the game.

Credits: 

Graphics

  • Spiron (@spiron_draws)
  • Marilyse Hochard (@Malyhooo)
  • Alizée Boyard (Instagram : alizée boyard)
  • Lucas Varnusson (dribbble : Lucas V / Insta : Lucas Varnusson)
  • DarkNekoGreen (@DarkNekoGreen)

Devloppement

  • @MCD_Artagnan (from @Nice_Penguins_)

Music

  • T05 (tzerofive.bandcamp.com)
